law.catch_line: Property on which property tax is computed under §§ 10-103, 10-104, 10-105, 10-304, and 10-305 of ...
law.text:
Property on which property tax is computed under §§ 10-103, 10-104, 10-105, 10-304, and 10-305 of this article may be sold for taxes only:
during a succeeding year; and
in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where the property is located.
